header: Expo Line service pattern change at Sapperton Station and Braid Station started on February 25, 2024. Please follow signs to ensure you're boarding from the correct platform.
description:
Customers travelling on Expo Line to Production Way-University and Lougheed Town Centre stations from Columbia Station should plan for an extra 12 minutes of travel time. Some transfers may be required at Braid Station to continue towards Production Way-University Station.

Frequency daily until 9:30 PM:
Expo Line trains between Waterfront Station and Braid Station will operate every 6 minutes.
Expo Line trains to and from Production Way station will operate every 12 minutes.

After 9:30 PM Expo Line trains to and from Production Way station will operate every 12 minutes. Trains will no longer terminate at Braid Station.

Expo Line trains between Waterfront Station and King George Station will operate at regular frequency on all days.

Millennium Line and Canada Line are unaffected.

This construction is expected to last approx. 2 years.

header: Prior to 5:30 AM weekdays, 6:00 AM Saturdays, and 7:30 AM Sundays & Holidays, the Cordova Street entrance to Waterfront Station is closed.
description: During those times, Canada Line customers should enter Waterfront via the entrance on Granville at Hastings.

header: UPDATE: The west Park and Ride facility at Mission City Station (WCE) is now open. Finishing work continues on the last 1/3 of the lot, but 2/3 of the spots are open and available to the public.
description:
The west Park and Ride facility at Mission City Station (WCE) is undergoing resurfacing work until further notice and parking in the area may be limited until the work is complete.

Customers may want to build extra time in their commute to find alternate parking as needed.

header: An additional $5 YVR Airport AddFare applies to some eastbound trips starting from YVR Airport, Sea Island Centre, or Templeton Stations, and ending at any station from Bridgeport Station onwards.
description:
AddFare is added to the following fare types (including concession fares):

- Single-use tickets and DayPasses purchased from YVR Airport, Sea Island Centre, and Templeton stations

- Compass Card Stored Value trips

- Tap to Pay (e.g., contactless Interac Debit, American Express, Mastercard, and Visa credit cards along with Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Samsung Pay.)

- YVR Airport AddFare is automatically deducted from the contactless card or the Stored Value on a Compass Card. 

For more information, including which trips and fare types are exempt from the YVR AddFare, please visit:

header: Due to ongoing maintenance, street level gate at Expo Line Sapperton Station needs to be operated manually. This may cause a delay to entering the station at the start of service. We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause.
Starting July 21, 2025, the elevator at Expo Line 22nd Street Station from the entrance to the Waterfront platform will be temporarily out of service due to replacement.
description:
Customers who normally get off at 22nd Street and use this elevator will need to stay on the train and get off at Edmonds Station and follow signs for Platform 2 and board any train headed back to 22nd Street Station.

Customers who normally board trains headed to Waterfront at 22nd Street Station will need to follow directional signs to Platform 2 and board any train and disembark at New Westminster Station then follow signs to Platform 1 and board any train to continue toward Waterfront Station.

Full project details can be found in the URL Link below.

Call the Customer Information team at 604.953.3333 if you have any questions or require further assistance.

header: Stop 61617 Westbound United Blvd @ King Edward St has been temporarily moved east, before the entrance of Value Village.

Starting October 21, 2025, the elevator from Beatty St entrance to concourse & platform level at Expo Line Stadium-Chinatown Station is temporarily out of service until early 2026, due to replacement.
description:
Elevator access to the Lost Property office is available via the Keefer Plaza elevator and station entrance. Follow the Expo Boulevard detour information in the URL link below and connect to Keefer Plaza using Abbott Street. 

Alternate options are available to customers wishing to access the station via the Beatty Street or Expo Boulevard entrances by connecting with routes #5 and #23.

Please allow an extra 20 minutes of travel time to complete detours, as required.

Full project details can be found in the URL Link below.

Call the Customer Information team at 604.953.3333 if you have any questions or require further assistance.

header: Update: Stop 58564 Northbound 208 St @ 47 Ave is temporarily closed from Monday, October 27 to Friday, December 5 from 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily due to construction.
Starting November 4, 2025, the single elevator at Expo Line Waterfront SkyTrain Station will be temporarily out of service until Spring 2026, due to replacement.
description:
Customers transferring between modes of transit or wishing to board the Expo Line at Waterfront Station have two detour options that connect customers with Expo Line at Granville SkyTrain Station instead. 

Please allow an additional 20-25 minutes of trip time to complete detours as required.

Elevators for Canada Line, SeaBus, and West Coast Express will remain in service; however, customers will not be able to connect to the Expo Line and must connect at Granville SkyTrain Station instead.

Full project details, along with detailed detour options can be found in the URL Link below.

Call the Customer Information team at 604.953.3333 if you have any questions or require further assistance.

header: Stop 53384 Westbound Brunette Ave @ Marmont St is temporarily closed from Mon Nov 17 through Fri Nov 28 due to construction.
Starting July 14, 2025, the elevator at Expo Line Nanaimo Station from the entrance to platform 1 will be temporarily out of service due to replacement.
description:
Customers who normally get off at Nanaimo Station and use this elevator will need to stay on the train and get off at Commercial-Broadway Station; transfer across platforms and board any train headed back to Nanaimo Station. 

Customers who normally board trains headed to Waterfront at Nanaimo Station will need to follow directional signs to Platform 2; board any train and disembark at 29th Avenue Station; transfer across the platform and catch a Waterfront-bound train.

Please allow 15 minutes extra trip time to complete detours as required.

Work is expected to take about four months.

Full project details can be found in the URL Link below.

Call the Customer Information team at 604.953.3333 if you have any questions or require further assistance.

Canada Line Track Maintenance on Sat, Nov 22 from 11:00 PM until end of service. Trains will single-track between Bridgeport and Richmond-Brighouse Stations. Please allow extra travel time.
description:
The effective headways during this work are:

Waterfront Station - Bridgeport Station - 10 minutes
Bridgeport Station - Richmond-Brighouse Station - 20 minutes
Bridgeport Station - YVR Airport Station - 20 minutes 

The last trains from Waterfront Stn will depart approximately 5 minutes later than normal timetable stated times.

header: Expo Line Track Maintenance on Sun, Nov 23 from 9:30 PM until end of service. Trains will single-track in both directions between Royal Oak Station and Edmonds Station. Platform 2 will be closed. Please board trains from Platform 1 at both stations.
description:
Please allow for an extra 15-20 minutes of travel time when traveling between Royal Oak and Edmonds stations.


Expo Line trains will operate Waterfront <-> King George/Production Way, stopping at Royal Oak Platform 1 and Edmonds Platform 1 in both directions. 


Additional short-turn trains will operate Waterfront <-> Metrotown & Edmonds <-> King George / Production Way. 


Some trains will dwell longer than normal at Metrotown and 22nd Street Stations. 

The Millennium Line will operate normally.

Affected stops:
Royal Oak Station @ Platform 2
Edmonds Station @ Platform 2
